sentence: The RNC censured Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger and deemed Jan. 6 legitimate political discourse.? For all the energy he creates at the party's grassroots,? Trump's stranglehold on the party is emerging as one of the biggest threats to the GOP's otherwise bright prospects in November,? David and Natalie wrote.
title: Mask wars claim another pol

sentence: Stefanik, a formerly (and putatively) moderate House member, leveraged her fealty to Trump to earn a promotion to the House conference chair after minority leader Kevin McCarthy booted Liz Cheney from the number-three GOP slot over Cheney's role in investigating January 6.
author: Tom Gogola
title: And the Winner of a Safe Seat in Congress Is Elise Stefanik!

sentence: Stefanik is the third-ranking leader of the House Republican caucus, replacing Rep. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo., who angered the party with her denunciations of Trump after the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol.
author: CHRIS MEGERIAN
title: Biden to confront the racism he's vowed to fight in visit to Buffalo after mass shooting
